wikipedia_page.main: Dr. Gerard Hall Lloyd Fitzwilliams, M.D., Ch.B., F.R.C.S., EDIN. (1882 – 8 April 1968) was a British physician worked in Hong Kong and a spy in Russia.

response: * Gerard H. L. Fitzwilliams and F. B. L. Bowley received their seats on the Hong Kong sanitary board by accalmation in the  local election.Endacott, G. B. Government and people in Hong Kong, 1841-1962 : a constitutional history Hong Kong University Press. (1964)

* An election on the Hong Kong sanitary board was held to fill a seat vacated after board member Gerard H. L. Fitzwilliams resigned in January., with 24-year old F. M. G. Ozorio elected as the youngest citizen ever to the board.
* British colonial physician Gerard H. L. Fitzwilliams was elected for a third time to the Hong Kong sanitary board, along with British expatriate and solicitor P. W. Goldring.
